verses.verse: And <S%G2532><s%> I Saw, <S%G1492><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> , Behold, The <S%G2400><s%> Lamb <S%G721><s%> Standing <S%G2476><s%> Upon <S%G1909><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Mount <S%G3735><s%> Sion, <S%G4622><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> ' With <S%G3326><s%> Him <S%G846><s%> A Hundred And <S%G1540><s%> Forty <S%G5062><s%> Four <S%G5064><s%> Thousand, <S%G5505><s%> Having <S%G2192><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Name <S%G3686><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G3962><s%> Of His Father <S%G846><s%> Written <S%G1125><s%> On <S%G1909><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G3359><s%> Their Foreheads. <S%G846><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> I Heard <S%G191><s%> A Voice <S%G5456><s%> Out Of <S%G1537><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Heaven <S%G3772><s%> As <S%G5613><s%> A Voice <S%G5456><s%> Of Waters <S%G5204><s%> Many, <S%G4183><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> As <S%G5613><s%> A Voice <S%G5456><s%> Of Thunder <S%G1027><s%> Great : <S%G3173><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> A Voice <S%G5456><s%> I Heard <S%G191><s%> Of Harpers <S%G2790><s%> Harping <S%G2789><s%> With <S%G1722><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G2788><s%> Their Harps. <S%G846><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> They Sing <S%G103><s%> As <S%G5613><s%> A Song <S%G5603><s%> New <S%G2537><s%> Before <S%G1799><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Throne, <S%G2362><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Before <S%G1799><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Four <S%G5064><s%> Living Creatures <S%G2226><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Elders. <S%G4245><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> No One <S%G3762><s%> Was Able <S%G1410><s%> To Learn <S%G3129><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Song <S%G5603><s%> <S%G1487><s%> Except <S%G3361><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Hundred And <S%G1540><s%> Forty <S%G5062><s%> Four <S%G5064><s%> Thousand, <S%G5505><s%> Who <S%G3588><s%> Have Been Purchased <S%G59><s%> From <S%G575><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Earth. <S%G1093><s%>

These <S%G3778><s%> Are <S%G1526><s%> They Who <S%G3739><s%> With <S%G3326><s%> Women <S%G1135><s%> <S%G3756><s%> Were Not Defiled, <S%G3435><s%> <S%G3933><s%> For Virgins <S%G1063><s%> They Are : <S%G1526><s%> These <S%G3778><s%> Are <S%G1526><s%> They Who <S%G3588><s%> Follow <S%G190><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Lamb <S%G721><s%> <S%G3699><s%> Wheresoever <S%G302><s%> He May Go. <S%G5217><s%> These <S%G3778><s%> Were Purchased <S%G59><s%> From Among <S%G575><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Men <S%G444><s%> As Firstfruits <S%G536><s%> To <S%G3588><s%> God <S%G2316><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> To The <S%G3588><s%> Lamb : <S%G721><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G4750><s%> Their Mouth <S%G846><s%> <S%G3756><s%> Was Not Found <S%G2147><s%> Guile; <S%G1388><s%> <S%G299><s%> For Blameless <S%G1063><s%> They Are <S%G1526><s%> Before <S%G1799><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Throne <S%G2362><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Of God. <S%G2316><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> I Saw <S%G1492><s%> Another <S%G243><s%> Angel <S%G32><s%> Flying <S%G4072><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> Mid - Heaven, <S%G3321><s%> Having The <S%G2192><s%> Glad Tidings <S%G2098><s%> Everlasting <S%G166><s%> To Announce To <S%G2097><s%> Those Who <S%G3588><s%> Dwell <S%G2730><s%> On <S%G1909><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Earth, <S%G1093><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Every <S%G3956><s%> Nation <S%G1484><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Tribe <S%G5443><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Tongue <S%G1100><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> People, <S%G2992><s%>

Saying <S%G3004><s%> With <S%G1722><s%> A Voice <S%G5456><s%> , Loud, <S%G3173><s%> Fear <S%G5399><s%> <S%G3588><s%> God, <S%G2316><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Give <S%G1325><s%> To Him <S%G846><s%> Glory, <S%G1391><s%> Because <S%G3754><s%> Is Come <S%G2064><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Hour <S%G5610><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G2920><s%> Of His Judgment <S%G846><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Do Homage To <S%G4352><s%> Him Who <S%G3588><s%> Made <S%G4160><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Heaven <S%G3772><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Earth <S%G1093><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Sea <S%G2281><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Fountains <S%G4077><s%> Of Waters. <S%G5204><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> Another <S%G243><s%> Angel <S%G32><s%> Followed, <S%G190><s%> , Saying, <S%G3004><s%> Is Fallen, <S%G4098><s%> Is Fallen <S%G4098><s%> Babylon <S%G897><s%> <S%G3588><s%> City <S%G4172><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Great, <S%G3173><s%> Because <S%G3754><s%> Of <S%G1537><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Wine <S%G3631><s%> Of The <S%G3588><s%> Fury <S%G2372><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G4202><s%> Of Her Fornication <S%G846><s%> She Has Given To Drink <S%G4222><s%> All <S%G3956><s%> Nations. <S%G1484><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> A Third <S%G5154><s%> Angel <S%G32><s%> Followed <S%G190><s%> Them, <S%G846><s%> Saying <S%G3004><s%> With <S%G1722><s%> A Voice <S%G5456><s%> , Loud, <S%G3173><s%> If <S%G1487><s%> Anyone <S%G5100><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Beast <S%G2342><s%> Does Homage To <S%G4352><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Image <S%G1504><s%> Its, <S%G846><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Receives <S%G2983><s%> A Mark <S%G5480><s%> On <S%G1909><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G3359><s%> His Forehead <S%G846><s%> Or <S%G2228><s%> Upon <S%G1909><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G5495><s%> His Hand, <S%G846><s%>

Also <S%G2532><s%> He <S%G846><s%> Shall Drink <S%G4095><s%> Of <S%G1537><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Wine <S%G3631><s%> Of The <S%G3588><s%> Fury <S%G2372><s%> Of <S%G3588><s%> God <S%G2316><s%> Which <S%G3588><s%> Is Mixed <S%G2767><s%> Undiluted <S%G194><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Cup <S%G4221><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G3709><s%> Of His Wrath, <S%G846><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> He Shall Be Tormented <S%G928><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> Fire <S%G4442><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Brimstone, <S%G2303><s%> Before <S%G1799><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Holy <S%G40><s%> Angels, <S%G32><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Before <S%G1799><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Lamb. <S%G721><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Smoke <S%G2586><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G929><s%> Of Their Torment <S%G846><s%> Goes Up <S%G305><s%> To <S%G1519><s%> Ages <S%G165><s%> Of Ages, <S%G165><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> No <S%G3756><s%> They Have <S%G2192><s%> Respite <S%G372><s%> Day <S%G2250><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Night <S%G3571><s%> Who <S%G3588><s%> Do Homage To <S%G4352><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Beast <S%G2342><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G1504><s%> Its Image, <S%G846><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> If <S%G1487><s%> Anyone <S%G5100><s%> Receives <S%G2983><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Mark <S%G5480><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G3686><s%> Of Its Name. <S%G846><s%>

Here The <S%G5602><s%> Endurance <S%G5281><s%> Of The <S%G3588><s%> Saints <S%G40><s%> Is, <S%G2076><s%> Here <S%G5602><s%> They Who <S%G3588><s%> Keep <S%G5083><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Commandments <S%G1785><s%> Of <S%G3588><s%> God <S%G2316><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Faith <S%G4102><s%> Of Jesus. <S%G2424><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> I Heard <S%G191><s%> A Voice <S%G5456><s%> Out Of <S%G1537><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Heaven, <S%G3772><s%> Saying <S%G3004><s%> , To Me, <S%G3427><s%> Write, <S%G1125><s%> Blessed <S%G3107><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Dead <S%G3498><s%> Who <S%G3588><s%> In The <S%G1722><s%> Lord <S%G2962><s%> Die <S%G599><s%> From Henceforth. <S%G534><s%> Yea, <S%G3483><s%> Saith <S%G3004><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Spirit, <S%G4151><s%> That <S%G2443><s%> They May Rest <S%G373><s%> From <S%G1537><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G2873><s%> Their Labours; <S%G846><s%> <S%G3588><s%> And <S%G1161><s%> Works <S%G2041><s%> Their <S%G846><s%> Follow <S%G190><s%> ' With <S%G3326><s%> Them. <S%G846><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> I Saw, <S%G1492><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> , Behold, <S%G2400><s%> A Cloud <S%G3507><s%> White, <S%G3022><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Upon <S%G1909><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Cloud One <S%G3507><s%> Sitting <S%G2521><s%> Like The <S%G3664><s%> Son <S%G5207><s%> Of Man, <S%G444><s%> Having <S%G2192><s%> On <S%G1909><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Head <S%G2776><s%> His <S%G846><s%> A Crown <S%G4735><s%> Golden, <S%G5552><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G5495><s%> His Hand <S%G846><s%> A Sickle <S%G1407><s%> Sharp. <S%G3691><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> Another <S%G243><s%> Angel <S%G32><s%> Came Out <S%G1831><s%> Of <S%G1537><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Temple, <S%G3485><s%> Crying <S%G2896><s%> With <S%G1722><s%> Loud <S%G3173><s%> Voice <S%G5456><s%> To Him <S%G3588><s%> Sitting <S%G2521><s%> On <S%G1909><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> , Cloud, <S%G3507><s%> Send <S%G3992><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G1407><s%> Thy Sickle <S%G4675><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Reap; <S%G2325><s%> Because <S%G3754><s%> Is Come <S%G2064><s%> To Thee <S%G4671><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Hour <S%G5610><s%> <S%G3588><s%> To Reap, <S%G2325><s%> Because <S%G3754><s%> Is Dried <S%G3583><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Harvest <S%G2326><s%> Of The <S%G3588><s%> Earth. <S%G1093><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> Put Forth <S%G906><s%> He <S%G3588><s%> Sitting <S%G2521><s%> Upon <S%G1909><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Cloud <S%G3507><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G1407><s%> His Sickle <S%G846><s%> Upon <S%G1909><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Earth, <S%G1093><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Was Reaped <S%G2325><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Earth. <S%G1093><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> Another <S%G243><s%> Angel <S%G32><s%> Came <S%G1831><s%> Out Of <S%G1537><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Temple <S%G3485><s%> Which Is <S%G3588><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Heaven, <S%G3772><s%> Having <S%G2192><s%> Also <S%G2532><s%> He <S%G846><s%> A Sickle <S%G1407><s%> Sharp. <S%G3691><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> Another <S%G243><s%> Angel <S%G32><s%> Came <S%G1831><s%> Out Of <S%G1537><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Alter, <S%G2379><s%> Having <S%G2192><s%> Authority <S%G1849><s%> Over <S%G1909><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Fire, <S%G4442><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> He Called <S%G5455><s%> With A Cry <S%G2906><s%> Loud <S%G3173><s%> To Him <S%G3588><s%> Having <S%G2192><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Sickle <S%G1407><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Sharp, <S%G3691><s%> , Saying, <S%G3004><s%> Send <S%G3992><s%> Thy <S%G4675><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Sickle <S%G1407><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Sharp, <S%G3691><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Gather <S%G5166><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Bunches <S%G1009><s%> Of The <S%G3588><s%> Earth; <S%G1093><s%> Because <S%G3754><s%> Are Fully Ripe <S%G187><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Grapes <S%G4718><s%> Her. <S%G846><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> Put Forth <S%G906><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Angel <S%G32><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G1407><s%> His Sickle <S%G846><s%> To <S%G1519><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Earth, <S%G1093><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Gathered <S%G5166><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Vine <S%G288><s%> Of The <S%G3588><s%> Earth, <S%G1093><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Cast The Fruit <S%G906><s%> Into <S%G1519><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Winepress <S%G3025><s%> Of The <S%G3588><s%> Fury <S%G2372><s%> Of <S%G3588><s%> God <S%G2316><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Great; <S%G3173><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> Was Trodden <S%G3961><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Winepress <S%G3025><s%> Outside <S%G1854><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> City, <S%G4172><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Came Forth <S%G1831><s%> Blood <S%G129><s%> Out Of <S%G1537><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Winepress <S%G3025><s%> As Far As <S%G891><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Bits <S%G5469><s%> Of The <S%G3588><s%> Horses, <S%G2462><s%> To The Distance Of <S%G575><s%> Furlongs <S%G4712><s%> A Thousand <S%G5507><s%> Six Hundred. <S%G1812><s%>
